# Basic Markdown

### H3 Heading

#### H4 Heading

##### H5 Heading

## Paragraphs

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

This is a second paragraph with **bold**, *italic*, ~~strikethrough~~, and `inline code`.

## Blockquote

> This is a blockquote.
>
> It can span multiple lines.

## Line Breaks

First line.
Second line (soft break).

First line.

Second line (hard break).
